title: Practice Challenge
description: Debug this code! We want to check if the user is 18. Fix the code in two different ways as indicated in the comments.
instructions:
1. **Method 1**: Convert `userAge` to a number using `Number()` inside the `if` condition.
2. **Method 2**: Compare `userAge2` to the string `'18'`.

testCases.description: Both methods print the success message

commonMistakes.correction: Ensure both sides are the same type.
